title: John Adams - Nixon in China
description:
"Nixon in China"
Considered to be the second most important minimalist opera of the XX century, one of the cornerstones of American minimalist music. It tells the story of Richard Nixon's visit to China in 1972, where he met with Mao Zedong and other Chinese officials.
Music by the American composer John Adams, libretto by Alice Goodman

File format: lossless, .ape (Monkey's Audio)
